overview: Please refer to Clinical Path Research Project Part 1.
ilo: Select, summarise and critically appraise published research in basic or translational pathology.
Formulate a research hypothesis based upon a synthesis of the published research evidence.
Design and undertake appropriate research experiments to answer a research hypothesis in the field of pathology.
Conduct supervised research in a specific area of basic or translational pathology research.
Communicate the method and findings of a research project in oral and written form.
generic_skills: Please refer to  Clinical Path Research Project Part 1

Prerequisites.content: Note: the following subject/s can also be taken concurrently (at the same time)CodeNameTeaching periodCredit PointsPATH40002Critical Analysis of Pathology ResearchSemester 1 (On Campus - Parkville)12.5
